data.text: @Oscar66064376 Well not quite..as Japan had no nuclear weapons so no fear of nuclear retaliation
@Oscar66064376 Well I would say it can't be worse than what's happening now.
@Oscar66064376 Well it's not exactly a conspiracy theory, Putin would love to retain as much of the Soviet Union as possible

@spportukraine22 Im just a cog in the giant machine but i don’t agree with the popular msn idea that Russia wants to invade all of Europe. If that was the case they would have carpet bombed the cities of Ukraine and not bother with with a ground army initially.
I guess we will find out.
@Oscar66064376 And you think they will stop at Ukraine?

@spportukraine22 I don’t there is any other way at this point. Aside from the condemnation and bad press the eu, nato or the us will abandon Ukraine militarily. Just as they have done to so many failed states. Ukraine would be best not owned by Russia or USA. But these days that’s fantasy.
@Oscar66064376 Yeah, just accept the demands of Russia..that way anytime they want something they can just invade a sovereign country!
@spportukraine22 My grandmother was Ukrainian, and my parents from Slovakian and i’m Australian for your context.
